summary: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.
cast: Ernest Borgnine|Betsy Blair|Esther Minciotti|Augusta Ciolli|Joe Mantell|Karen Steele|Jerry Paris|James Bell|Joe Bell|John Beradino|Nick Brkich|Marvin Bryan|Charles Cane|Paddy Chayefsky|John Dennis|Steven Hecht|Paul Hoffman|Walter Kelley|Doris Kemper|Jack Klugman|John Milford|Silvio Minciotti|Robin Morse|George Nardelli|Waclaw Rekwart|Edwin Rochelle|Clark Ross|Ed Sullivan|Frank Sutton|Hal Taggart|Arthur Tovey|Minerva Urecal|Alan Wells
title: Marty
